definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: When the wind blows , the slender tree bends but never breaks.
sentences.chinese: 起风时，这棵细长的树常弯曲但决不会断。

sentences.english: A slender, elongated, threadlike object or structure.
sentences.chinese: 纤维一种细长的线状物体或组织。

sentences.english: Seismosaurus had a long neck, a small head and a long thin tail.
sentences.chinese: 地震龙长着长脖子，小脑袋，以及一条细长的尾巴。

sentences.english: The lubricative path is a slightness hole which is oblique to the crank.
sentences.chinese: 此油道属细长孔，且于轴线成一定的角度。

sentences.english: Her long, narrow blue eyes were swimming.
sentences.chinese: 她那双细长的蓝眼睛泪汪汪的。

sentences.english: It also appears to have what looks like a string-like arm protruding from its body.
sentences.chinese: 它的身体外凸出的胳膊像绳子一样细长。

sentences.english: Large elongated compressed food fish of european atlantic waters.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲大西洋水域身体细长扁平的食用鱼。

sentences.english: Changes the nature ensiform leaf blade to be tall and slender. It has the obvious midrib.
sentences.chinese: 革质剑形叶片细长，具明显的中肋。

sentences.english: The long slender hand dauts wearing a smile photograph piece of cloud and more sees more sorrowful.
sentences.chinese: 细长的手抚摸着云含笑的张照片，越看越悲伤。

sentences.english: Her shadow slenderized under the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 在月光下她的身影变得细长。

sentences.english: Any of about 100 species of small, slender freshwater fishes (family Percidae), native to eastern North America.
sentences.chinese: 鲈形目鲈科镖鲈亚科约一百种小型细长淡水鱼的统称。

sentences.english: Elongated mostly scaleless marine fishes with large pectoral fins and reduced pelvic fins.
sentences.chinese: 多数细长的无鳞海水鱼，有大的胸和退化的。

sentences.english: Fruit is medium sized elongated conically shaped with very smooth skin and a high sugar content.
sentences.chinese: 果实中型细长锥形非常光滑皮肤和糖分过高。

sentences.english: Prayer is the slender sinew that moves the muscle of omnipotence.
sentences.chinese: 祷告是细长的肌腱可以牵动无所不能者的肌肉。

sentences.english: Fish with long tubular snout and slim body covered with bony plates.
sentences.chinese: 长有管状口鼻，细长的身体表面覆盖有骨盘。

sentences.english: Maggie smiled, her long black hair flowing and almost glowing with sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉口露微笑，她的头发细长而柔顺，乌黑而发亮。

definition: perfectly straight/straight as a ramrod/bolt upright
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
